name: bear-notes
description: Bear Notes MCP server with TypeScript and native SQLite. Provides comprehensive Bear Notes integration for creating, searching, reading, and adding files to Bear notes.
long_description: This extension provides comprehensive Bear Notes integration through a TypeScript MCP server using native Node.js SQLite. It enables creating, searching, reading, and adding files to Bear notes directly from Claude Desktop with full type safety and modern JavaScript features.

tools.name: bear-create-note
tools.description: Create a new note in your Bear library with optional title, content, and tags

tools.name: bear-search-notes
tools.description: Find notes in your Bear library by searching text content (including attached files) or filtering by tags

tools.name: bear-open-note
tools.description: Read the full text of a Bear note including all content (including attached files), formatting, and metadata

tools.name: bear-add-text-append
tools.description: Add text to the end of an existing Bear note or to a specific section within it

tools.name: bear-add-text-prepend
tools.description: Add text to the beginning of an existing Bear note or section within it

tools.name: bear-add-file
tools.description: Attach a file (image, PDF, Excel, etc.) to an existing Bear note by providing base64-encoded content
